name: Marshall Inu
description: Marshall Inu is a token on the Ethereum blockchain who’s mission is to pay UFC fighers, and fighters in general, a fair pay for their fights. It will pay fighters during training, and also add to their fight night purse to ensure they get paid fairly for their efforts. $MRI is based off the world renowned Shiba Inu, but it has actual utility rather than simply being a “meme” token.
